documentation.author: Lisa K. Holcomb
documentation.purpose: This rule will alert Mid-Level Providers and Physicians when VTE Prophylaxis has not been ordered (or documented contraindications) within 12 hours after surgery stop time is documented.
documentation.explanation:
Meds and orders in rule: Dabigatran Enoxaparin Fondaparinux Rivaroxaban Warfarin Heparin (strength dose equal to or greater than 5000)
Compression Device Intermittent Pneumatic Reason Mechanical VTE Prophylaxis Not Received Reason Pharmacological VTE Prophylaxis Not Received Reason ICU Mechanical VTE Prophylaxis Not Received Reason ICU Pharmacological VTE Prophylaxis Not Received Patient is Low Risk for VTE

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_E
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PREVIOUS_ACTION_L
templateDefinitions.definition: If previous action of ACTION_NAME was executed for SCOPE OPT_LINK initiated by PERSONNEL user in last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT
templateDefinitions.description: If previous action of ACTION_NAME was executed for SCOPE OPT_LINK initiated by PERSONNEL user in last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_BUILD_MESSAGE_L
templateDefinitions.definition: ACTION a message named MSGNAME with text of MSGTEXT preceded by OPT_DELIMITER
templateDefinitions.description: Create or add to a text message to be used by subsequent templates

statements.statement:
select action = if (d.seq = 1) "Create" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Append To" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) "1" elseif (d.seq = 2) "2" ENDIF
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(2))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_HTML_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert with title OPT_TITLE from html file HTML_FILE with parameters OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_OVERRIDE_DEFAULT, OPT_PROBLEMS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_PROBLEM, OPT_PROB_CONFIRMATION, OPT_PROB_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_FREETEXT_PARAM, OPT_OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_LINK.

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only

value.value: SELECT cv.display@NEWLINEFROM encntr_prsnl_reltn ep@NEWLINE , code_value cv@NEWLINEPLAN ep@NEWLINEwhere ep.encntr_id = trigger_encntrid@NEWLINEand ep.prsnl_person_id = reqinfo->updt_id@NEWLINEand ep.active_ind = 1@NEWLINEand ep.beg_effective_dt_tm < sysdate@NEWLINEand ep.end_effective_dt_tm > sysdate@NEWLINEand ep.expiration_ind = 0@NEWLINEJOIN cv @NEWLINEwhere cv.code_value = ep.encntr_prsnl_r_cd @NEWLINEand cv.display_key in ("ADMITTINGPHYSICIAN", "ATTENDINGPHYSICIAN", "COVERINGPHYSICIAN", "DBA",@NEWLINE"NURSEPRACTITIONER","PHYSICIANASSISTANT",@NEWLINE"CONSULTINGPHYSICIAN")@NEWLINEdetail@NEWLINElog_misc1 = "FOUND", @NEWLINElog_message = build2("prsnl = reqinfo->updt_id: ", reqinfo->updt_id, " - reltn (", trim(cv.display,7), ") = ", log_misc1)@NEWLINEgo@NEWLINE
